lead_paragraph: As banks prepare to roll out this technology, the experience on the other side of the Atlantic shows how to avoid fraudulent activity on these new types of credit and debit cards.

headline.main: Lessons From Europe on Using Contactless Cards

snippet: As banks prepare to roll out this technology, the experience on the other side of the Atlantic shows how to avoid fraudulent activity on these new types of credit and debit cards....
abstract: Imminent rise in use of so-called contactless credit and debit cards is raising worries about potential fraud due to their reliance on wireless technology; experts offer tips to minimize security risks when using systems based on what is termed near field communication, or NFC, wireless technology.
